bug.author: Timoeller
bug.summary: FARMReader return multiple is_impossible answers to one question
bug.description: We need to adjust to the new format introduced in FARM 0.4.4

comments.comment: The issue seems to be coming from two place. One is within FARM the other is how haystack handles results coming back from FARM. We will create separate PRs to fix both and release a newer version of FARM asap.
